akn:section.akn:heading: Authority to seize property subject to forfeiture

akn:content.akn:p:
§ 7321. Authority to seize property subject to forfeiture Any property subject to forfeiture to the United States under any provision of this title may be seized by the Secretary. (Aug. 16, 1954, ch. 736, 68A Stat. 869; Pub. L. 94–455, title XIX, § 1906(b)(13)(A), Oct. 4, 1976, 90 Stat. 1834.)
Editorial Notes Amendments1976—Pub. L. 94–455 struck out “or his delegate” after “Secretary”.
